---
title: CSS Skull
description: Pure CSS skull, he's kinda cute. I made this in 2018, and is definitely due for a rebuild/refactor
image:  data:image/png;base64,
date: 2023-09-01
rss: true
style: '
    .cssskull {
        align-items: center;
        background-color: black;
        display: flex;
        height: 100vh;
        max-height: 1000px;
        min-height: 600px;
        border-radius: 0.75rem;
        justify-content: center;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .skull {
        position: relative;
        width: 350px;
        height: 500px;
    }

    .shadow {
        top: 0;
        position: absolute;
        width: 50%;
        height: 100%;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        z-index: 99;
    }

    .frontal-bone {
        display: block;
        background: ivory;
        width: 100%;
        height: 70%;
        border-radius: 50% 50% 25% 25%;
    }

    .eye-socket {
        position: absolute;
        top: 30%;
        width: 25%;
        height: 30%;
        z-index: 2;
    }

    .eye-socket:before {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background: black;
    }

    .eye-socket.left {
        transform: translateX(-25%);
        left: 25%;
    }

    .eye-socket.left:before {
        border-radius: 53% 47% 32% 41% / 45% 58% 21% 40%;
    }

    .eye-socket.right {
        right: 25%;
        transform: translateX(25%);
    }

    .eye-socket.right:before {
        border-radius: 47% 53% 41% 32% / 58% 45% 40% 21%;
    }

    .maxilla {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        background: ivory;
        width: 50%;
        margin-left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        height: 10vh;
    }

    .maxilla .nasal-cavity {
        position: relative;
        margin-top: -10px;
    }

    .maxilla .nasal-cavity::before {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        width: 20px;
        height: 20px;
        background: black;
        left: 50%;
        top: -4px;
        border-radius: 0 0 20px 0;
        transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(-50%);
        transform-origin: 0;
    }

    .maxilla .nasal-cavity .nostril {
        display: inline-block;
        background: black;
        width: 20px;
        height: 40px;
        border-radius: 100%;
    }

    .maxilla .nasal-cavity .nostril.left {
        transform: rotate(25deg);
    }

    .maxilla .nasal-cavity .nostril.right {
        transform: rotate(-25deg);
    }

    .jaw {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-around;
        width: 50%;
        margin-left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        height: auto;
        margin-top: -2vh;
        background-color: black;
    }

    .jaw .tooth {
        background: ivory;
        height: 4vh;
        width: 25%;
        border-radius: 0 0 4vh 4vh;
    }'
---
